name: ClickHole Greeting Cards Pack (Target Exclusive)
white_cards: A one-star Uber driver named "Wife of Tarantula."
Luring my husband to the bedroom with a trail of ferret teeth and appearing on the bed in a ferret costume.

black_cards.text: Hallmark has invented a new holiday. It's called "_____ Day."
Happy Birthday! I love you. Here's _____.
Honey, it's gonna take more than a shitty greeting card to make up for ten years of _____.
Roses are red. Violets are blue. I am _____ and so are you.
